meta.content: Digg, pictures, technology, breaking news, entertainment, politics, headline news, celebrity news, offbeat, world business, sports, funny videos

div.div: HARDER THAN ASKING FOR A PRENUP
Of all the known reasons for getting a divorce, we bet you never heard this one before. You both make too much money to stay together.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/100r98J&via=Digg&text=Should You Get A 'Tax' Divorce?

div.div: The world is starting to win the war against tuberculosis, but drug-resistant forms pose a new threat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Twim9z&via=Digg&text=New Drug-Resistant Tuberculosis Alarms Scientists

div.div: Research suggests that more and more American university students think they are something special. High self-esteem is generally regarded as a good thing -- but could too much of it actually make you less successful?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VyIOA3&via=Digg&text=Does Confidence Really Breed Success?

div.div: PHOEBE GIVES JOEY A RUN FOR HIS MONEY

div.a: Some Guy Calculated The Number Of Sexual Partners Of The 'Friends' Characters

div.div: Some guy on Reddit claims to have totaled up the number of sexual partners for the characters on "Friends." Here's the carnal breakdown.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VILs31&via=Digg&text=Some Guy Calculated The Number Of Sexual Partners Of The 'Friends' Characters

div.a: Mexican Drug Gangs Dig Into Mining

div.div: The Zetas cartel, one of Mexico's most violent groups, has moved into coal mining as it's "more lucrative than drugs."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uo1QWl&via=Digg&text=Mexican Drug Gangs Dig Into Mining

div.a: This Simple Blood Test Reveals Birth Defects — And The Future Of Pregnancy

div.div: Many women with high-risk pregnancies elect to undergo amniocentesis or chorionic villus sampling—invasive procedures that check for chromosomal abnormalities but carry with them a risk of miscarriage. Now there's a simple blood test.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtbJpi&via=Digg&text=This Simple Blood Test Reveals Birth Defects — And The Future Of Pregnancy

div.a: A Sleeping Giant As Seen From Space

div.div: "I have a hard time seeing this as anything other than a paean to humanity’s inability to learn."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UMD1ag&via=Digg&text=A Sleeping Giant As Seen From Space

div.a: A Veteran Hostage Negotiator’s Advice On Handling The GOP

div.div: The use of hostage-taking imagery to describe the coming debt ceiling crisis is now so ubiquitous that I thought I’d ask a veteran police hostage negotiator what he thinks of the looming standoff.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WrF5RE&via=Digg&text=A Veteran Hostage Negotiator’s Advice On Handling The GOP

div.div: Since 2009, an international team of astronomers, based in the Chilean Andes, have been studying the molecular gases and tiny dust grains from which stars, planetary systems, galaxies, and, yes, life are formed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TO8mau&via=Digg&text=An Intergalactic Birth In Photos

div.a: How Almost Anyone Can Take You Off Facebook

div.div: Getting your buddy's Facebook account turned into a “Memorial” state is surprisingly easy — and locks them out of Facebook.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UNvLek&via=Digg&text=How Almost Anyone Can Take You Off Facebook

div.div: In the movie, the local newspaper, the Hill Valley "Telegraph," plays a major role in the plot exposition of both films. And the paper’s news judgment is exceedingly bizarre.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wb3eLx&via=Digg&text='Back To The Future'’s Terrible Newspaper

div.a: Man Recovers His iPhone By Luring Thief Into His Apartment Using OKCupid

div.div: The horny crook was lured out on a bogus “date” this week by his victim, a guy who created a phony online dating profile — as a woman — to seduce the crook and get back his iPhone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WhFlST&via=Digg&text=Man Recovers His iPhone By Luring Thief Into His Apartment Using OKCupid

div.a: Forget The Internet Of Things: Here Comes The Internet Of Cars

div.div: What if large groups of people could go beyond ridesharing – replacing traditional car ownership altogether through on-demand access to the cars they want: a convertible in the summer, an SUV for winter ski trips?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X5YMR4&via=Digg&text=Forget The Internet Of Things: Here Comes The Internet Of Cars

div.a: 'Deep Space Nine' Helped To Invent Everything You Love

div.div: The grittiest of "Star Trek" series helped to give us a lot of the things we take most for granted on science fiction and fantasy television today — and here are just a few of the ways.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VyLQUS&via=Digg&text='Deep Space Nine' Helped To Invent Everything You Love

div.div: ROALD DAHL: GREAT WRITER, TERRIBLE PHYSICIST

div.a: How Many Seagulls Would It Really Take To Lift James's Giant Peach?

div.div: If you've read Roald Dahl's "James and the Giant Peach" you may remember that 501 seagulls lifted James's huge fruit into the skies. It turns out that figure is poppycock.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RuXXSC&via=Digg&text=How Many Seagulls Would It Really Take To Lift James's Giant Peach?

div.a: Mitt Romney Got 47 Percent Of The Vote

div.div: As tabulated by the AP, Romney got 47.2 percent of the full presidential vote.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ULlgHm&via=Digg&text=Mitt Romney Got 47 Percent Of The Vote

div.a: America’s Rape Problem: We Refuse to Admit That There Is One

div.div: The same week that a leaked video out of Steubenville, Ohio showed high school boys joking and laughing about an unconscious teenager in the next room who had just been raped—“They raped her quicker than Mike Tyson!”—House Republicans let the Violence Against Women Act (VAWA) expire.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3CCy9&via=Digg&text=America’s Rape Problem: We Refuse to Admit That There Is One

div.div: HORNY TOAD DOESN'T LIKE YOU THAT WAY

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZjH3K1&via=Digg&text=Animals With Misleading Names

div.a: Former NRA President: Banning Assault Weapons Is Like Banning People Of Color

div.div: The NRA has repeatedly thumbed its nose at calls for stronger gun safety measures after the tragic shooting in Newtown, but these latest comments by former president Marion Hammer take the lobbying organization's pro-gun radicalism to new heights.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XseGcs&via=Digg&text=Former NRA President: Banning Assault Weapons Is Like Banning People Of Color

div.a: This Soccer Cameraman Is Better Than The Soccer Players He's Filming

div.div: A cameraman in Oman has been watching the game so intently during his career that he managed to pick up a few tricks along the way, none better than his backheel volley that Cristiano Ronaldo would have been proud of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtpsdJ&via=Digg&text=This Soccer Cameraman Is Better Than The Soccer Players He's Filming

div.div: After more than thirty years of constant increase, prison populations have leveled off and in the last few years have begun to decline. It’s a momentous change but the story has been under-reported because few people want to play up the good news.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VkYEMr&via=Digg&text=The Prison Population Is Down

div.a: The Day William Shatner Tweeted At An Astronaut (And The Astronaut Replied)

div.div: Shatner tweeted a question to the Canadian Space Agency's Chris Hadfield, who is currently serving as the International Space Station's Flight Engineer for Expedition 34 -- and who has indeed been tweeting from space. Hadfield's is a glorious reply to Shatner's glorious question.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W8lzZF&via=Digg&text=The Day William Shatner Tweeted At An Astronaut (And The Astronaut Replied)

div.div: FINALLY USE THAT POPEIL PASTA MAKER

div.a: Stop Chasing Inbox Zero And Other Tech Resolutions

div.div: Forget Inbox Zero. Get off Twitter. And other resolutions to make your tech life better in 2013.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zk4zGM&via=Digg&text=Stop Chasing Inbox Zero And Other Tech Resolutions

div.div: Almost all of Iran’s “new” weaponry — including jet fighters, ‘copters, warships, tanks, missiles and other equipment — is a copy of a much older American, British, Russian, Chinese or North Korean design.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10Yh0ZA&via=Digg&text=Iran Unveils Its Copycat Arsenal

div.a: U.S. Politely Asks Google's Schmidt Politely Not To Visit North Korea

div.div: Eric Schmidt is planning a “private” visit to North Korea, despite the objections of the U.S. State Department.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W5vezS&via=Digg&text=U.S. Politely Asks Google's Schmidt Politely Not To Visit North Korea

div.a: German Chancellor Angela Merkel Sings Along With Caroler In Blackface

div.div: German chancellor Angela Merkel had herself a nice little Friday, singing merrily along with a group of carolers. Just one small problem, one of them was in blackface.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VIGzqQ&via=Digg&text=German Chancellor Angela Merkel Sings Along With Caroler In Blackface

div.a: Formal Fridays: Welcome To The Hip New Dress Code

div.div: There's a new trend afoot: For Fridays, traditional flip-flops and hoodies and jeans are out, apparently — people are eschewing casual wardrobes and dressing like, well ... people from the 1920s (or maybe just hipsters), top hats and all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VCKG8x&via=Digg&text=Formal Fridays: Welcome To The Hip New Dress Code

div.a: Hulu CEO And CTO To Depart The Company In 2013

div.div: Hulu just posted an internal email from CEO Jason Kilar to its blog, indicating that he and CTO Rich Tom will be leaving the company during the first quarter of 2013.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ws92Ro&via=Digg&text=Hulu CEO And CTO To Depart The Company In 2013

div.a: Is 'The Trillion Dollar Coin' A Real Solution To The Debt Ceiling Debate?

div.div: If the Republicans in Congress are really irresponsible and outrageous enough to hold the reputation and economy of the United States of America hostage just to win a few re-election points, then perhaps the appropriate response is for the Treasury to save the country by minting a "trillion-dollar coin."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RwsFKQ&via=Digg&text=Is 'The Trillion Dollar Coin' A Real Solution To The Debt Ceiling Debate?

div.a: We Don't Have A Spending Problem, We Have An Aging Problem

div.div: Ever since Ronald Reagan first said it, Republicans have been fond of insisting that "we don't have a revenue problem, we have a spending problem." But it turns out that isn't true. Let's take a look at the raw data.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XqgvXj&via=Digg&text=We Don't Have A Spending Problem, We Have An Aging Problem

div.div: MORNING SICKNESS MAKES A GOOD COVER

div.a: How Much Alcohol Is Safe For Expecting Mothers?

div.div: An occasional drink during pregnancy is unlikely to harm most children, but we lack the tools to fully measure alcohol's effects on the developing brain.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10Yng3B&via=Digg&text=How Much Alcohol Is Safe For Expecting Mothers?

div.a: Why The Next President Will Probably Be Black Too

div.div: Politics is a repetitive business. And two of the best candidates are black.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W936vL&via=Digg&text=Why The Next President Will Probably Be Black Too

div.a: In Search Of The Perfect, Diaper-Free Gadget Trade-In Box

div.div: After people began sending gadgets in MacGyver-like packaging concoctions, buyback service Gazelle tried to make the perfect box.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZZ50rp&via=Digg&text=In Search Of The Perfect, Diaper-Free Gadget Trade-In Box
